mean_cn: adj.一般的，普通的；总的，大体的　　n.将军　　in general通常，大体上
sentence: In general, trees are tall, green, and have brown bark.
sentence_tra: 一般来说，树木是又高又绿的，而且还有棕色的树皮。

mean_cn: n. 芭蕾舞, 芭蕾舞剧;  芭蕾舞团;

sentence_tra: 大象小姐的梦想是成为一个芭蕾舞者。

sentence: Make sure your subject is in focus before taking the photo.
sentence_tra: 拍照前要确保你的物体对焦。

sentence: No thanks! I'm a non-smoker and you should be too.
sentence_tra: 不用了，谢谢！我不抽烟的，你也不该抽。

sentence: I'd be lost without you, my handsome mountain guide!
sentence_tra: 要是没有我帅气的山地导游我一定会迷路的。

mean_cn: n. 气候;  （社会思想等）趋势;

mean_cn: n.港湾，港口，安全处v.包庇，庇护；怀有

sentence: Her clothes make her body seem to disappear against the wall.
sentence_tra: 她的衣服让她的身体好像消失在墙里一般。

mean_cn: adv. 迅速地；很快地；立即

mean_cn: adj.有可能；可信的；适合的adv.很可能

sentence_tra: 如果你看到乌云，可能会下雨。

mean_cn: n. 布置;  排列;  组合体;  整齐;  调解;  办法;

sentence_tra: 这里有摆放得很舒适的桌子供户外就餐用。

sentence: Make sure to pack all your clothing for the trip!
sentence_tra: 确保打包好所有你这次旅行需要的衣服。

mean_cn: n.建议，意见；细微的迹象；暗示；联想

sentence_tra: 这个医生给了我一些关于健康饮食的建议。

sentence: It was a serious car crash.
sentence_tra: 这是一次严重的车祸。

mean_cn: adj.人造的，假的，非原产地的

sentence: The beach is a popular location for tourism.

sentence: When I drop a rock on my foot, every single toe hurts.
sentence_tra: 当我把石头砸到脚上的时候，每个脚趾都疼。

sentence: Drinking while pregnant will do great harm to your baby.

sentence: The suburb was almost an hour's drive to the city.
sentence_tra: 这片郊区离城市大约有一小时车程。

mean_cn: adj. 吸引人的, 妩媚动人的, 引起兴趣的;

sentence_tra: 哇哦，我的女神！你简直太妩媚动人了！

sentence: "2+2=4" should be pretty obvious to you.
sentence_tra: "2+2=4"对你来说是显而易见的吧。

sentence: We go to the movies for some entertainment.

sentence: Those who commit crimes must be severely punished.

sentence: The exit is the first door on your right. See you next time!

sentence: Every country develops its military force to defend its territory.
sentence_tra: 每个国家都发展自己的军事力量来保卫自己的领土。

mean_cn: n.平均；平均水平adj.通常的；平均的v.平均为

sentence_tra: 这个月的平均气温比去年这个时候要高。

mean_cn: phr. 变为现实; 成为事实;

sentence: The road takes us to our destination.

mean_cn: adv. 也;  和;  此外

sentence: He dressed up as if he was a warrior.

sentence: With the internet, we can have a global network of friends.

sentence: You can get in touch with me by phone or email.

sentence: The industrial zone of the city is the source of most of the air pollution.

mean_cn: n.材料，原料，资料　adj.物质的，实体的
